questions.question_text: Which SAM role grants a user the ability to set reclamation rules?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct. https://www.servicenow.com/docs/bundle/xanadu-it-asset-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/task/t_AddAReclamationRule.html

questions.question_text: To accurately report your true up costs during reconciliation, what must you update In your software models? (Choose two.)

choices.E: License cost plus maintenance cost plus reserved license cost
choices.C: License cost plus reserve license cost

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AE
In question 193 about Office 365 reserved licenses are used for calculate true-up cost and total spend.. so maybe A & E should be proper answer :)

comments.content:
A & D, excerpt from SAM on-Demand course:

"To accurately report your software true-up cost during reconciliation, update your software models with the license cost or the license plus maintenance cost specified on your contract. Use these costs to calculate and report the true-up cost. 

If you do not specify a license cost or a license plus maintenance cost, the average software entitlement cost is used for true-up cost calculations."

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
Answer: A and D
I think A and D is the correct answer.

questions.question_text: When creating entitlements on the Software Entitlement Form and selecting a product Publisher Part Number (PPN), what information is defaulted from the PPN? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
ppm - reference table: "samp_sw_product_definition" which has columns "License type" & "License metric"

Selected Answer: AC
License metric and License type from PPM. Additionally, you get Software model and Metric group.

Selected Answer: B
The correct answer is:

B. Vendor Catalog item
The Vendor Catalog item feature allows organizations to source the same software model from multiple vendors, providing flexibility in procurement and enabling price comparison or availability considerations across different providers

questions.question_text: When creating a purchase order, which feature allows sourcing a software model from multiple providers?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct. "As a software asset management user or a software model manager, you can add the software product life-cycle details to the software model for each full version. To use a TPM screen with data on the timeline, ensure that the software life-cycle data is populated in the software product life-cycle table. ". https://www.servicenow.com/docs/bundle/xanadu-application-portfolio-management/page/product/application-portfolio-management/concept/technology-portfolio-management.html
